title: Large lagoon-front development site
details:
Extending to just over one and three quarter acres, this slightly elevated plot has frontage to the Mahwella Lagoon.

Situated approximately 1km from the main road and only 15 minutes from the shops and amenities of Tangalle the site is well connected. It will also benefit from the opening of the Southern Expressway Extension in 2019 which will slash journey times to Galle, Colombo and Bandaranaike Airport.
